c74object.name: the.dependency.check
c74object.digest: Report whether all necessary dependencies are met.
c74object.description:
Written by Tim Heinze Â© 2020, www.xenorama.com.
Report whether all necessary dependencies are met.
Will check for given externals (mxo for macOS, architecture-based .mxe for Windows) or custom abstractions, and report a boolean value from its outlet.

attribute.name: externals
attribute.digest: List of externals to look for.
attribute.description:
List of externals to look for. If any given external is not found by Max, a '0' is reported from the outlet, otherwise '1'.
The output value also depends on the abstractions list.

attribute.name: abstractions
attribute.digest: List of custom abstractions to look for.
attribute.description:
List of custom abstractions to look for. If any given abstraction is not found by Max, a '0' is reported from the outlet, otherwise '1'.
The output value also depends on the externals list.

attribute.name: automatic
attribute.description:
Automatically check on object load (default: 1). When set to '0', the bject is idle until a 'bang' is received at its inlet.
This may be useful when the check must not be performed until other parts of the parent patch are initialised or otherwise called upon.

method.name: bang
method.description: If a 'bang' is received at the inlet, all externals are saught within the searchpaths. Either a '1' (all dependencies met) or a '0' (one or more missing) will be reported from the outlet and in the latter case an error notification will be sent to the Max console.
